diagnoses.label: Spinal Stenosis
evidence_spans: Superimposed on this is mild spondylosis and disc bulge at C6-7, C5-6, C4-5, and C3-4. There is moderate central spinal stenosis at C3-4.

medications.name: Elavil
warnings: The patient was placed on Elavil and was subsequently lost to follow-up.
evidence_spans: The patient was placed on Elavil and was subsequently lost to follow-up.
The patient was placed on Elavil and was subsequently lost to follow-up.

patient_summary: The patient is a 44-year-old man who had numbness and pain in his left hand and wrist. He was diagnosed with carpal tunnel syndrome and put on a medicine called Elavil. The patient lost contact with his doctor and did not follow up.
notes: The MRI findings did not correlate with the clinical findings and history. The patient was placed on Elavil and was subsequently lost to follow-up.
